quotes.quote: I would not know what the spirit of a philosopher might wish more to be than a good dancer.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: If you cannot get rid of the family skeleton, you may as well make it dance.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Almost nobody dances sober, unless they happen to be insane.
quotes.author: H. P. Lovecraft

quotes.quote: Dance is the hidden language of the soul.
quotes.author: Martha Graham

quotes.quote: The dance is a poem of which each movement is a word.
quotes.author: Mata Hari

quotes.quote: Every day brings a chance for you to draw in a breath, kick off your shoes, and dance.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: A sympathetic Scot summed it all up very neatly in the remark, "You should make a point of trying every experience once, excepting incest and folk dancing."
quotes.author: Sir Arnold Bax
